public final class ReportSlaveIDResponse
extends ModbusResponse

Class implementing a ReadMEIResponse. Derived from similar class for Read Coils response.

Version:
1.2rc1-ghpc (09/27/2010)
Author:
Julie Haugh (jfh@ghgande.com)
